sentences.en: "The most important thing is to be honest," she says, without the trace of a blush.
sentences.cn: “最重要的是要诚实,”她毫不脸红地说.

sentences.en: All trace of his working - class background was deliberately obscured.
sentences.cn: 他 工人阶级 出身的所有痕迹都给有意地隐藏起来了.

sentences.en: Brand's keen ear caught the trace of an accent.
sentences.cn: 布兰德敏锐的耳朵听出了口音。

sentences.en: He wanted to trace roughly.
sentences.cn: 他想草草地勾画.

sentences.en: How far back can you trace your family tree?
sentences.cn: 你的家谱可以追溯到多少代？

sentences.en: I saw the faintest trace of a smile cross Sandra’s face.
sentences.cn: 我看到桑德拉的脸上闪过一丝微笑。

sentences.en: Kelp is rich in vitamins and trace elements.
sentences.cn: 大型褐藻富含维他命和微量元素.

sentences.en: Now draw or trace ten dinosaurs in ascending order of size.
sentences.cn: 现在按照体型由小到大的顺序画出或是临摹出10只恐龙。

sentences.en: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.cn: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

sentences.en: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.cn: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.en: Police are anxious to trace two men seen leaving the house just before 8am.
sentences.cn: 早上将近8点时有人看到两名男子离开那所房子，警方急于找到他们。

sentences.en: Put just a trace more salt in my soup.
sentences.cn: 我的汤里再放一点盐吧! vi,

sentences.en: Sondheim’s book traces the changing nature of the relationship between men and women.
sentences.cn: 桑德海姆的这本书研究了男女关系性质的变化。

sentences.en: Staff will be able to trace calls at the touch of a button.
sentences.cn: 工作人员一摁按钮便可以追踪电话。

sentences.en: The police traced the call (= used special electronic equipment to find out who made the telephone call) to her ex-husband's number.
sentences.cn: 警方用追踪装置查出是她前夫的电话号码打出的电话。

sentences.en: There was a trace of exasperation in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的声音听上去有些愤怒。

sentences.en: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.cn: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.en: They could not trace him.
sentences.cn: 他们找不到他.

sentences.en: They feared some undetected trace of poison.
sentences.cn: 他们担心一些未被识破的投毒痕迹.

sentences.en: Trace an analogy between pastoral poetry and landscape painting.
sentences.cn: 找出田园诗和风景画之间的相似之处.

sentences.en: We finally traced him to an address in Chicago.
sentences.cn: 我们终于追查到他在芝加哥的一个地址。

sentences.en: We have lost all trace of him.
sentences.cn: 我们找不到他的踪迹.

words.tran_cn: 起源于；可追踪的；可描绘的
[核] 示踪物；追踪者；描图者；（铁笔等）绘图工具
追踪；追查；描摹；摹图；显迹
追溯（trace的过去分词）；跟踪；摹写
[法]痕迹，踪迹；[气象]微量；[仪]迹线；缰绳

phrases.tran_cn: 挣脱羁绊，变得不服从，鲁莽
无影无踪地；渺无踪迹地
不着痕迹地；了无踪迹地

trans.tran_cn: 痕迹，踪迹，微量，极少量，描记图，轨迹
trans.tran_en: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed

trans.tran_cn: 跟踪，追踪，追溯，探索，查出，描绘，勾勒
trans.tran_en: to find out where a telephone call is coming from by using special electronic equipment

trans.tran_cn: 跟踪； 追溯； 描摹
trans.tran_en: to find the origins of when something began or where it came from
